name: vega-lite
author: Jeffrey Heer, Dominik Moritz, Kanit "Ham" Wongsuphasawat
description: Vega-lite provides a higher-level grammar for visual analysis, comparable to ggplot or Tableau, that generates complete Vega specifications.

scripts.pretsc: mkdir -p build && rm -rf build/*/** && cp package.json build/
scripts.build: npm run tsc && cp package.json build && browserify src/vl.ts -p tsify -d -s vl | exorcist build/vega-lite.js.map > build/vega-lite.js
scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs build/vega-lite.js -cm --source-map content=build/vega-lite.js.map,filename=build/vega-lite.min.js.map -o build/vega-lite.min.js && npm run schema
scripts.build:examples: npm run build && npm run build:examples-only
scripts.build:site: browserify site/static/main.ts -p [tsify -p site] -d | exorcist build/site/main.js.map > build/site/main.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -f vega-lite.* & find -E src test site examples -regex '.*\.(js|js.map|d.ts|vg.json)' -delete & rm -rf data
scripts.prestart: npm run data && npm run build && scripts/index-examples
scripts.schema: typescript-to-json-schema --path tsconfig.json --type TopLevelExtendedSpec > build/vega-lite-schema.json && npm run renameschema && cp build/vega-lite-schema.json _data/
scripts.presite: npm run build && npm run data && npm run build:site && npm run build:toc && npm run build:versions
scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run test:only && npm run lint
scripts.posttest: npm run schema && npm run data && npm run mocha:examples
scripts.test:nocompile: npm run test:only && npm run lint && npm run mocha:examples
scripts.test:debug-examples: npm run tsc && npm run schema && mocha --recursive --debug-brk --inspect build/examples
scripts.watch:build: watchify src/vl.ts -p tsify -v -d -s vl -o 'exorcist build/vega-lite.js.map > build/vega-lite.js'
scripts.watch: nodemon -x 'npm run build && npm run test:nocompile' # already ran schema in build
